quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom
It is the mark of an educated mind to entertain a thought without accepting it
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is not an act, but a habit
Man is by nature a political animal destined to live in society
Without friends, no one would want to live, even with all other goods
Happiness depends upon ourselves and our character, not external things
Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet
Reason is our supreme faculty; intellect is the best part of us
The state exists for the sake of a good life, not mere survival
The whole is greater than the sum of its parts
Quality is not an act, it is a habit
The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living differ from the dead
To avoid criticism say nothing, do nothing, be nothing
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet
Hope is a waking dream
Dare to know! Have courage to use your own understanding
Science is organized knowledge; wisdom is organized life
Act only by maxims you could will to become universal laws
quotes.source: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals

quotes.quote: Humans alone possess moral dignity and the capacity for obligation
Duty is the necessity of acting from respect for moral law
quotes.source: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals

quotes.quote: Freedom means independence from the compulsion of another's will
Reason alone, not desire or consequence, is the source of moral law
quotes.source: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals

quotes.quote: Treat humanity never merely as means but always as an end
quotes.source: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals

quotes.quote: Virtue, not happiness, is the highest good; it alone is unconditional
Out of the crooked timber of humanity, no straight thing was ever made
Two things fill the mind with wonder: the starry heavens above and the moral law within
He who is cruel to animals becomes hard also in his dealings with men
Happiness is not an ideal of reason but of imagination
quotes.source: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals

quotes.quote: All our knowledge begins with the senses, proceeds then to understanding, and ends with reason
Morality is not properly the doctrine of how we may make ourselves happy, but how we may make ourselves worthy of happiness
There is no eternal wisdom; all truth is perspective
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how
Good and evil are not fixed; they are created by the strong
Life is will to power, not a search for happiness or virtue
You must have chaos within to give birth to a dancing star
The powerful create freedom by transcending weakness, not escaping chains
Truths are illusions we forgot are illusions; the strong create truth
Herd morality was created by the weak to suppress the strong
Happiness is not the aim; excellence and self-overcoming are
That which does not kill us makes us stronger
Become who you are
The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe
The thought of self-destruction is a powerful comfort; it helps one through many a bad night
All truly great thoughts are conceived while walking
In individuals, insanity is rare; but in groups, parties, nations, it is the rule
The soul is healed by being with children and simple hearts
Pain and suffering are always inevitable for a large intelligence
Man is a mystery; if you spend your life solving it, your time is not wasted
Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most
Man has such a predilection for systems that he will distort truth to fit them
Reason alone cannot comprehend life; the heart knows what reason cannot
The degree of civilization is measured by how it treats its weakest
Suffering is the origin of consciousness and the path to redemption
To love someone means to see them as the infinite intended them
The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding something to live for
Above all, don't lie to yourself
The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness
We sometimes encounter people, even perfect strangers, who interest us at first sight, before a word has been spoken
Nothing is easier than to denounce the evildoer; nothing harder than to understand him
Realists do not fear the results of their study
The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing of importance
The only thing we can know is that we know nothing, and that is wisdom
Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it
All happy families resemble one another; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way
Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself
True freedom is found in simplicity and renouncing the false needs of society
quotes.source: The Kingdom of God Is Within You

quotes.quote: Pure reason can establish nothing; only love reveals the truth of life
The state is based on violence; true justice requires non-resistance to evil
quotes.source: The Kingdom of God Is Within You

quotes.quote: Joy can only be real if people see their lives as a service to others
quotes.source: The Kingdom of God Is Within You

quotes.quote: Freethinkers are those who are willing to use their minds without prejudice
The chief difference between words and deeds is that words are always intended for men for their approbation, but deeds can be done only for the welfare of reality
In the name of the welfare of mankind, terrible crimes have been committed
quotes.source: The Kingdom of God Is Within You

quotes.quote: Without knowing what I am and why I am here, life is impossible
The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity
If you want to be happy, be
Real knowledge is knowing the extent of one's ignorance
To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge
Lead by example with rectitude, and the people will follow naturally
Filial piety and respect for elders are the roots of all virtue
The superior man thinks of virtue; the common man thinks of comfort
The superior man is free from anxiety by fulfilling his proper role
The superior man understands what is right; the inferior understands profit
A man of humanity loves all men through proper conduct and righteousness
When you do your duty faithfully, happiness follows naturally
The man of wisdom delights in water; the man of humanity delights in mountains
Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous
When we see men of worth, we should think of equaling them
The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions
To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it
Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart
